def_cn: （置于形容词和副词前，表示强调）
def_en: Young people sometimes use mega in front of adjectives or adverbs in order to emphasize them.

def_cn: (用于名词前)特别好的，异常巨大的，非常重要的
def_en: Young people sometimes use mega in front of nouns in order to emphasize that the thing they are talking about is very good, very large, or very impressive.
